Title: Relates to allowing a court to consider additional factors when awarding temporary possession of a marital residence during a divorce action
Summary: Broadens consideration by the courts in awarding temporary possession of a marital residence during the pending of a divorce action to include the best interests of the child, domestic violence and financial circumstances.
LawCode: Amd ยง234, Dom Rel L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the domestic relations law, in relation to consideration by the courts in awarding temporary possession of a marital residence during the pending of a divorce action
